EmailTemplate.name: Outage notifications sample
EmailTemplate.subject: Ipreo Outage Advisory TEST
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Outage Advisory
Ipreo Products not available
Event Date & Time: 19-Jan-15 9:00am - ET ongoing Next Update expected: 10:30am ET
Dear Client,
Please be advised that we are currently experiencing unexpected network issuee resulting in possible slowness and connectivity problems. We are actively investigating the issue and working to address it as soon as possible.
We apologize for any inconvenience this is causing, thank you for patience. We will keep you updated regularly.
Please donâ€™t hesitate to email or call 24/7 support team for questions or assistance:callmenowIR@ipreo.com +1 (800) 305-0819 or (212) 849-5424 (Americas) +44 20 7665 9822 (Europe) +852 58082616 (Asia Pacific) +81 3 4579 5698 (Japan)
